name: Medieval Soldier: Alien Invasion
description:
A soldier has time traveled back in time, reaching the medieval era. He now has aliens hunting him down for his inhumane actions.

How to play:
W, A, S, D keys to move
Spacebar to Jump
Right Click to aim
Click to shoot

The game is not impossible, you can beat all levels if you try hard enough.

Made in 72 hours during the Quarantine Jam
